title: Search Keyword Generation
systemPrompt: Please respond with search keywords for the request below.
prompt:
Q: For each message, identify and extract key terms and phrases related to the topics discussed to help recall relevant prior discussions from a text database. The response should not only select keywords for key topics that are most important from the sentences but also format them to enable complex searches using logical and proximity operators.
Conversation messages:
[
Gerald: I really enjoy flying. It makes me happy I've always wanted to get a pilot's license. I think we talked about that before. I'd love to fly around in my own personal plane. Having it would be really helpful. Wonder if there's an app for getting more information about it? You wrote one didn't you?
Gerald: Or should I get a boat? Ugh I have no idea.
Ralf:
]
Instructions:
Analyze the message to pinpoint the main subjects. Select keywords and format them in a structured way that represents the specific topics discussed, focusing on proper nouns, technical terms, and specific products or tools mentioned. Format the keywords to potentially include logical connectors like AND, OR, and NOT, or grouping parentheses for complex queries. This will aid in both proximity and logical searches. For example, if the user discusses multiple topics, consider formatting like "(Flying OR Pilot License) AND (Plane OR Aircraft) AND (App OR Application OR Software)".
Response:
Provide keywords based on the core topics or subjects discussed in the user's message, ensuring relevance to the actual entities or concepts mentioned, formatted to aid in complex search queries. Please do not include the names of any speakers.
A: (Flying OR Pilot License) AND (Plane OR Aircraft) AND (App OR Application OR Software) AND (Boat OR Ship OR Seacraft)Q: For each message, identify and extract key terms and phrases related to the topics discussed to help recall relevant prior discussions from a text database. The response should not only select keywords for key topics that are most important from the sentences but also format them to enable complex searches using logical and proximity operators.

{chat_user_prompt_last_five}
]

For example, if the user discusses multiple topics, consider formatting like "(Flying OR Pilot License) AND (Plane OR Aircraft) AND (App OR Application OR Software)".
Response:
Provide keywords based on the core topics or subjects discussed in the user's message, ensuring relevance to the actual entities or concepts mentioned, formatted to aid in complex search queries. Please do not include the names of any speakers.

title: Performing Slow but Quality RAG on Search Results
agentName: Slow but Quality RAG Agent Three
systemPrompt: The task is to summarize any text into a human-readable paragraph. Misplaced prompt template tags, odd parentheses, or other formatting issues should not affect the summary. Ensure the summary is clear and concise.
prompt:
A user has sent a message in an ongoing online chat conversation. In order for a response to be appropriately crafted, stored excerpts from the chat logs of the discussion will need to be referenced.
Below is a summary of a chat log from the discussion:
[
[TextChunk]
]
Summarize the important details of this old chat log, capturing key points: what was said, who said it, any emotions, and any other critical details such as word definitions or meanings.

title: Search Result Summarizer
systemPrompt: This task involves summarizing an input text. Misplaced prompt template tags, odd parentheses, or other formatting issues should not affect the summary. Ensure that the summaries are clear and detailed.
